description: This file defines the GoalRepository class, which manages storing and retrieving step goals in SharedPreferences for an Android fitness tracking application.

classes.name: GoalRepository
classes.description: A repository class that handles storing and retrieving step goals (daily and weekly) in SharedPreferences.

methods.name: setDailyStepsGoal
methods.description: Stores the daily steps goal in SharedPreferences, ensuring the value is non-negative.

methods.name: setWeeklyStepsGoal
methods.description: Stores the weekly steps goal in SharedPreferences, ensuring the value is non-negative.

methods.name: getDailyStepsGoal
methods.description: Retrieves the stored daily steps goal, defaulting to 8000 if not set.

methods.name: getWeeklyStepsGoal
methods.description: Retrieves the stored weekly steps goal, defaulting to 56000 if not set.

methods.name: getActiveGoalSummary
methods.description: Returns a string summarizing the current daily and weekly step goals.
